issue.title: System fails to run all of a sudden (on file that ran fine moments before) from seemingly outside (packages) cause.

content.raw:
John, unfortunately in order to recreate the issue on your end as it stands now, you would have to meet reveal requirements as the controllers and the validation code have that dependency.  I am going to try to pare down the example tomorrow and run it on my other system, so if that fails, I will attach the pared down package to this thread.

I grab all the info I can tomorrow before I take any action and post here.  If there is anything else you need, let me know.
content.html:
John, unfortunately in order to recreate the issue on your end as it stands now, you would have to meet reveal requirements as the controllers and the validation code have that dependency. I am going to try to pare down the example tomorrow and run it on my other system, so if that fails, I will attach the pared down package to this thread.

I grab all the info I can tomorrow before I take any action and post here. If there is anything else you need, let me know.
